Articles.Content:
Hey Guys,

I have followed the instructions listed and must be missing something because as I try to setup the new mechjeb and remote control thing it is causing the game to fail at loading. Basically it starts loading the modules I have plugged in and then it gets to TSAS loading the avionicsNoseCone/Model and stalls. here is a screen grab of the Debug console:

Any help would be sweet!
